name: Battle for the Amulet!
description:
I decided to create a fighting game for a change I guess...

Sorry mobile players :(

~~~~Controls~~~~

w,a,s,d or arrow keys to move

[Space] to use your Strongest attack

Z to use a weaker attack than the Strongest

X to use the Weakest attack

Special Powers when you have the Amulet!

More info in-game!

~~~~Notes and Credits~~~~

Health bar by @griffpatch on scratch!

Assets used by Cursor Madness

Everything else was entirely by me!
